attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: we should all really think abouts cannabis laws. if the goverment legalise it would no longer be full of harmfull rubbish like coat hangers. if they do it like amsterdam they control what is going about and u can tax it. its not a crime to smoke fags so why cannabis smoking fags is worse than cannabis. please all sign up if u agree

rejection.details:
Similar petitions exist e.g 
http://petitions.number10.gov.uk/Growing-Cannabis/

Plus incomplete name.
reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
False or incomplete name or address information
